alert.note: Alert for Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 14 at 3:47PM EDT until October 15 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Pockets of shallow coastal flooding. Less than one foot of inundation above ground level expected (3.6 to 5.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...Early Sunday afternoon high tide. * IMPACTS...Any flooding will be limited to the most vulnerable locations. This includes Easy Street on Nantucket Harbor and possibly near the Chappy Ferry Dock in Edgartown Harbor. This is not expected to result in any road closures. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chappaquiddick Point MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.2 ft, Moderate 4.2 ft, Major 5.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/01 AM 2.8/ 3.4 2.1/ 2.6 1.1/ 1.6 1-2 None 15/01 PM 3.7/ 4.2 2.8/ 3.4 1.7/ 2.2 3 None 16/11 AM 3.6/ 4.1 2.7/ 3.2 1.6/ 2.0 1 None 17/02 AM 2.8/ 3.4 2.1/ 2.6 1.3/ 1.8 1 None 17/12 PM 3.2/ 3.7 2.5/ 3.0 1.2/ 1.7 1 None Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/12 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 1.2/ 1.7 1-2 None 15/01 PM 3.4/ 3.9 1.4/ 1.9 1.6/ 2.0 3 None 16/01 AM 3.2/ 3.7 1.3/ 1.8 1.7/ 2.2 2 None 16/01 PM 3.4/ 3.9 1.4/ 1.9 1.6/ 2.0 1 None 17/01 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 1.3/ 1.8 1 None Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/01 AM 3.9/ 4.4 0.2/ 0.8 1.0/ 1.5 2 None 15/01 PM 5.0/ 5.5 1.4/ 1.9 1.7/ 2.2 3-4 Minor 16/02 AM 4.4/ 4.9 0.8/ 1.3 1.6/ 2.0 3 None 16/02 PM 4.7/ 5.2 1.2/ 1.7 1.5/ 2.0 2 Minor 17/02 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.2/ 0.7 1.1/ 1.6 1 None &&
info.instruction: Drivers should be alert for nuisance type ponding of water.
